author: elecharny
msg: Applied the fixes needed to build the code with the changes made in Mavibot.
Note : we still have issues in some serialization (ParentAndRdn)

author: elecharny
msg: Applied a lot of changes to be able to inject more than 50 000 entries in a BTree (mainly dealing with the replacement of WeakReference with a cache).
We now have two different ind of BTrees :
Duplicate values are stored as an array of values up to a number of values, then a sub-btree is created (for managed btrees only).
